Practice in EPAM started in 2009 (in Belarus) from 5 engineers who were brave enough to learn & try Mobile technologies.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tFor 13 years we have grown from 5 people in Belarus to more Android, iOS, Blackberry (past) we have expanded our experience and added Mobile Testing, Xamarin, React Native & trendy Flutter to our portfolio.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.\\tFrom a couple of shared devices now we iOS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have years of experience in Native iOS development using iOS SDK with Objective-C, Swift programming languages. As experts with years of experience we develop virtually for any iOS device: iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, Apple Watch.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3355,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/55e35230-3e3b-4590-a599-60d154425d70/Android.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/55e35230-3e3b-4590-a599-60d154425d70/Android.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Android.png\",\"name\":\"Android.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"55e35230-3e3b-4590-a599-60d154425d70\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":136,\"height\":136},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Android\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have years of experience in Native Android development using Android SDK and NDK with Android Java, Kotlin and C++. As experts with years of experience we develop virtually for any Android device: Smartphones, Tablets, Watches, Set-top boxes, Kiosks, etc.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3692,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/87d3a5ef-2594-4934-916c-10470b4f2645/Cross-Platform JavaScript.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/87d3a5ef-2594-4934-916c-10470b4f2645/Cross-Platform JavaScript.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Cross-Platform JavaScript.png\",\"name\":\"Cross-Platform JavaScript.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"87d3a5ef-2594-4934-916c-10470b4f2645\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":136,\"height\":136},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cross-Platform JavaScript\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Erasing the lines between web, mobile and desktop development, we are gained our experience in modern cross-platform JavaScript frameworks. In our JavaScript cross-platform portfolio, you can find knowledge about modern frameworks like ReactNative and Expo, hybrid solutions with Ionic and Cordova and others. With Competency Center, we continue investing in our expert area growth and provide high-class solutions with all advantages of cross-platform development.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3662,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aa95afd5-90bb-4e56-909a-9f09950ecc7d/Microsoft and Xamarin.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aa95afd5-90bb-4e56-909a-9f09950ecc7d/Microsoft and Xamarin.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Microsoft and Xamarin.png\",\"name\":\"Microsoft and Xamarin.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"aa95afd5-90bb-4e56-909a-9f09950ecc7d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":136,\"height\":136},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Microsoft and Xamarin\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We've been Elite Partner with Xamarin since platform's early times and profoundly growing our expertise in this technology. We have number of certified Xamarin developers and architects and constantly training more to satisfy ever-growing demand. We capable of delivering Xamarin apps with 100% Native UI as well as Xamarin.Forms.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3233,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/36c010cb-c650-47d9-920c-4fa98804cf9d/Flutter.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/36c010cb-c650-47d9-920c-4fa98804cf9d/Flutter.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Flutter.png\",\"name\":\"Flutter.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"36c010cb-c650-47d9-920c-4fa98804cf9d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":136,\"height\":136},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Flutter\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We started developing Flutter applications almost from the moment Flutter was announced by Google and at the current moment we have huge expertise in it. With Flutter, we can develop applications for any Android and iOS mobile devices, as well as actively increase our knowledge in the field of developing applications for TVs (AndroidTV and AppleTV), desktops (Linux, Windows, macOS) and even for the Web. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
